  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_83706</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_83706</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Energies of the ball being thrown up into the air</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Energie der Kugel, die oben in die Luft geworfen 
wird</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Énergies de la boule étant jetée vers le haut 
dans l'air</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Energias da esfera que está sendo jogada acima no
ar</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Energie della sfera che è gettata in su 
nell'aria</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ενέργειες της σφαίρας που ρίχνεται επάνω στον αέρα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Energías de la bola que es lanzada para arriba 
en el aire</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the energies (kinetic and gravitational potential  of a ball at different stages after being thrown up into the air.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">air</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ball</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gravitational potential energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">kinetic energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Energie (kinetisches und
Gravitationspotential einer Kugel an den unterschiedlichen Stadien, 
nachdem oben in die Luft geworfen werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre les énergies 
(potentiel cinétique et de la gravité d'une boule à différentes 
étapes après avoir été jeté vers le haut dans l'air.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra as energias (potencial 
cinético e gravitacional de uma esfera em estágios diferentes após 
ser jogado acima no ar.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra le energie (potenziale
cinetico e gravitazionale di una sfera nelle fasi differenti dopo 
essere stato gettato in su nell'aria.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τις ενέργειες (κινητική 
και βαρύτητας δυνατότητα μιας σφαίρας στα διαφορετικά στάδια 
μετά από να ριχτεί επάνω στον αέρα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra las energías 
(potencial cinético y gravitacional de una bola en diversas etapas 
después de ser lanzado para arriba en el aire.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Luft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kugel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">mögliche Gravitationsenergie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">kinetische Energie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">air</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">boule</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">énergie potentielle de la gravité</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">énergie cinétique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ar</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">esfera</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">energia potencial gravitacional</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">energia cinética</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">aria</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">sfera</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">energia potenziale gravitazionale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">energia cinetica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αέρας</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σφαίρα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">βαρύτητας πιθανή ενέργεια</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κινητική ενέργεια</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">aire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">bola</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">energía potencial gravitacional</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">energía cinética</string>
          </keyword>
